item.title: Sinkhole, 14th September
item.description:
This sinkhole has just opened up this afternoon outside 63 Hillingdon road. My mum has just fallen down it as the ground gave way and hurt herself. Could we get some cones or something to cover it until it’s able to get fixed to prevent anyone else falling down or animals falling in? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hillingdon Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
